title: RP Card has already been redeemed
body: I bought this RP Card at EB Games today, and i put it in codes. It takes like a good 20 seconds to load, and then says and error has occured. Then when i put it in again, it says that it has already been redeemed. Help me riot, because I got this for christmas.

replies.body: Maybe You have not entered the code correctly? try not putting spaces between the numbers or either try putting spaces between each section.
